attributes.action: save Severalls Hospital's buildings & grounds, and to not allow the Development to continue as proposed, but to keep & convert the buildings & grounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Severalls Mental Hospital, opened in 1913, was built to care for approximately 2,000 people from parts of East Anglia.
Built in the "Arts & Crafts" style, and laid out in the "Echelon" plan, this Edwardian Hospital sucessfully cared for it's residents until it closed in 1997. Now lying derelict & due to lack of proper security, has suffered from vandalism, arson & general neglect. The Main Hall was totally destroyed in 1995, and the Administration Building (Grade 2 listed) has been damaged by fire too. Set in many acres of mature gardens & woodland, the buildings & land now face a new threat -major redevelopment, involving the loss of most of the original buildings, and large chunks of the surrounding land.
It is my hope that the Developers & the Planning Dept. will reconsider the proposals, and revise to keep much more of the historically & socially important original buildings, which with a bit of thought, could be converted & reused (much better for the environment!)
Thank you.
